ai-mil3.4.7:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, you’re not to say to you,
ai-mil3.4.7:1.3_0: ‘This great earth is grounded on water, grounded on the earth, and my words are grounded in the water.’
ai-mil3.4.7:1.4_0: The Elder Dhammarakkhita took waterpot and told the King,
ai-mil3.4.7:1.5_0: “Great king, if that’s how to make this water is more than the water, oil isn’t covered up and water.”
ai-mil3.4.7:3.1_0: The seventh enquiry is the seventh thing.
